name: BattleRoyale Warriors
description:
How to play
The BattleRoyal Warriors is a board game for 2 players each with a different warrior.
The spiral shaped board has 63 spaces numbered from 1 to 63 with different design. Depending on the space you enter, you piece will advance, move back or suffer a penalty.
In a turn a player rolls a dice which indicates the number of spaces to advance.
The space 63 can only be entered with an exact roll. If a player rolls and gets a higher number than the number of remaining spaces to the goal, the player will advance to the space 63 and then go back until completing the number rolled.
Exciting Features:
-Play this dice game with friends and family -Memes sound effects
-Stunning 3D graphics
COMING SOON IN THE NEXT UPDATES! Online Multiplayer Mode
Cooler Game effects
